text: davud parannu: "tanre atukalute kuttattilekk ninre atinekkuti avasyappetunnatilute avan ninneat aniti ceyyukayan. kuttalikalayi kaliyunnavarilere perum parasparam atikramam pravarttikkunnavaran. satyavisvasam svikarikkukayum salkkarmannal pravarttikkukayum ceytavarealike. ennal attarakkarute ennam valare kuravan." davudin manas'silayi; nam addehatte pariksiccatayirunnuvenn. atinal addeham tanre nathaneat papameacanam teti. kumpittu vinu. pascattapiccu matanni
